messages.subject: Looking for unschooling mentor
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Everyone, I m looking for someone willing to write back and forth to me off list.  Probably at first suggesting reading material (I m overwhelmed with
messages.messageBody:
Hello Everyone,

I'm looking for someone willing to write back and forth to me off
list. Probably at first suggesting reading material (I'm overwhelmed
with all that's out there and I just haven't picked a place to start
yet) and maybe just be a sounding board for questions and someone to
discuss my fears with. I believe my son needs to be unschooled but I
keep struggling with the how. I'll be honest that I feel that I need
someone who is understanding and gentle. I've got some big fears
about all this and right now I'm very sensitive about feeling like
I'm failing my son no matter which way I go.

I don't feel like I have much to offer in the way of reciprocation
but I hope someday I can pay it forward by helping someone with what
I have learned and experienced.

If anyone feels that they have a bit of energy and time to share
please write me at smccann@...

In appreciation,
Sarah
